dashboard_header: Active Domains | Pending Verification | Rate Limit Status
add_domain.instruction: Add this CNAME record to your DNS provider once. We will handle rotations forever.
api_token.notice: Generate Scoped API Token. Warning: This token is shown only once. It is hashed using SHA-256 before storage.
status_active: Auto-renewing. Next renewal scheduled. Last issuance logged.
status_pending: Delegation not detected. Confirm _acme-challenge CNAME target.
status_error: Validation failed. Open diagnostics for exact failure mode + trace.
